title: Replace founder expertise content with pilot partnership messaging

requirements.summary: Remove founder Navy ET background, veteran-founded messaging, and multi-modal technology differentiation content from FounderExpertiseSection
acceptanceCriteria: All content in the seven selected elements (XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/section[5]/div[2]/div[3]/div[1] through div[3]/div[2]) is removed
No Navy ET background messaging remains visible
No multi-modal technology differentiation content remains visible

file_operations.description: Remove all existing content from the seven selected div elements within section[5] that currently display founder Navy ET background, veteran-founded status messaging, technical expertise highlights, military-grade precision content, and multi-modal technology differentiation. Clear the text content, headings, and descriptive paragraphs from these elements while maintaining the section structure and container hierarchy.

requirements.summary: Add pilot partnership messaging to replace removed founder expertise content
acceptanceCriteria: The text 'Seeking first pilot installation partners' is displayed in the selected section
The text 'Pre-commercial prototype stage — be among the first' is displayed in the selected section
Both messages use MOBIUS-NOVA brand typography and styling consistent with other landing page sections
The messages are arranged in a visually appealing layout within the existing section structure

file_operations.description: Replace the cleared content in section[5] with two new pilot partnership messages: 'Seeking first pilot installation partners' and 'Pre-commercial prototype stage — be among the first'. Apply MOBIUS-NOVA brand styling using Montserrat font family, brand colors (liquid-silver, nova-gold, cosmic-blue), and typography guidelines consistent with other landing page sections. Arrange the messages in a visually appealing layout within the existing div structure, using appropriate heading levels, spacing, and alignment to match the overall landing page design system.
